title:
The AI-Augmented
Engineer
bullets: The Force Multiplier: Engineers shift from writing syntax to orchestrating multiple AI agents to generate volume.
Scale: A small team of 4 can achieve the output of 10 by leveraging agents for documentation, testing, and boilerplate.
Automated Quality: The "Quality Engineer" role evolves to building the "Test-Feed-Fix-Verify" loop—automating the rejection of insecure AI code.
notes: Two-column split: left is a solid deep navy panel with white text; right is a full-height photo. Title sits upper-left with a thin horizontal divider line underneath. Body copy is three paragraph-style bullets with bold lead-in terms (The Force Multiplier / Scale / Automated Quality) followed by regular-weight text. Keep generous line spacing and wide left margin.
